name: Seiren No Saiten - You will fall in love!
name_original: Seiren No Saiten - You will fall in love!
description:
Seiren No Saiten

It's the school festival day and it's been exactly 1 year since Daisuke fell in love with a girl he doesn't remember her name or face. All year he tried to find out who his mystery girl was, but he failed.

At that time, he had the help of three friends who are in love with him and forced the protagonist to decide between one of them and even dating.
